channel.title: IT on DefinIT
channel.description: Recent content in IT on DefinIT

item.title: When everyones an Architect.. no one is..
item.description: I think this is the first time I have written a “rant” post (for a while at least) so if you don’t want to hear me whine run away now! In the past 12 months I think I have met more folk with Architect in their job title than I truly believe is valid. Now I will be clear this is not a slight on the individuals all of them have been exceptional (at least the ones I have had the pleasure to work with).
